newsitem.title: USA: Cineplex says Sony talks still under way.
newsitem.headline: Cineplex says Sony talks still under way.

text.p: Cineplex Odeon Corp said it is still discussing a possible merger with Sony Corp unit Loews Theaters Group, according to a filing Thursday with U.S. regulators.

"At this stage there are no further details to announce other than that discussions concerning the merger continue," the Toronto-based company said in its quarterly filing with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.

Cineplex Odeon noted that "there is no assurance that an agreement will be entered into or, if entered into, that a transaction will be completed." Any such merger would be subject to U.S. and Canadian regulatory approvals, it added.

Cineplex confirmed on June 20 that it was holding merger talks with the Sony Retail Entertainment Inc group. A combination of the two movie concerns would create North America's second biggest movie theater chain.
